Halcyon Data

An equity analysis consultancy started by yours truly
Site Under Construction

Github Repo

In another life, I found myself doing education policy research which led to equity data analysis work. I needed a website to help promote my consultancy and provide clarity on what I was and was not offering to potential clients in this fledgling business endeavor of mine.

Meeting the Needs for Halcyon Data's Launch

From our the equity analysis work that I have done over the course of Fall 2020, I knew that I needed a website that clearly displayed my services, what comes with those services, package rates, and a way to contact me if they were in need of a data consultant.

The website that I had in mind had several must have features, as well as some added flare. Halcyon Data needed: an eye-catching landing page, animations, listed features, listed packages, form integration, former clients and testimonials, and examples of previous data analysis projects.

This project is currently underconstruction, am I am making major progress everytime I work on this website. The full website is slated to launch in January 2021.


Benchmarks & Performance Metrics

After my initial brainstorming session, I decided to focus on five key areas that would highlight the most important details about the constultancy to display on my new website:

  • A beautifully animated home page that utilizes SCSS instead of JavaScript to achieve its styling
  • Distinct sections that detail what the business is, what services are offered, and how much those services cost
  • A logo wall for past clients
  • A central location to connect with me to find out more information about the consultancy
  • A beautiful portfolio with examples of previous work (that maintains confidentiality and anonymity)

And I am on my way to finishing this website!
